main event: An unidentified flying object (UFO) was sighted near Andrews, South Carolina on January 21, 1969, described as an orange crescent-shaped light that disappeared after a few minutes.
interesting points: The observer claimed the object appeared bright and larger than a basketball, It was seen pulsating and emitted no sound, The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes, The object was reported to be high in the sky, moving rapidly and changing direction, It remained relatively motionless at first before accelerating in speed.
witness description: A 29-year-old high school senior and his wife.
